properties.areaDesc: Grand Portage to Grand Marais MN
properties.headline: Heavy Freezing Spray Warning issued January 11 at 11:29AM CST until January 12 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Duluth MN
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Heavy Freezing Spray Warning, heavy freezing
spray at a rate of 2 cm per hour or greater expected, and may
rapidly accumulate on vessels. For the Small Craft Advisory,
northeast winds 10 to 20 knots with gusts up to 25 knots and
waves 1 to 4 feet expected.

* WHERE...Grand Portage to Grand Marais MN.

* WHEN...For the Heavy Freezing Spray Warning, from 6 PM this
evening to 9 AM CST Sunday. For the Small Craft Advisory, from
4 PM this afternoon to 4 PM CST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Operating a vessel in heavy freezing spray is
hazardous. Freezing spray may render mechanical and electronic
components inoperative. Rapid ice accretion on decks and
superstructures may result in a catastrophic loss of
stability. Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should prepare for dangerous accumulation of ice on
their vessel. If possible, remain in port, avoid the warning area
or conduct mitigation.

Anyone operating a smaller vessel should avoid navigating in
hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 4 PM CST SUNDAY... ...HEAVY FREEZING SPRAY WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM CST SUNDAY
